alert.note: Alert for Central Sacramento Valley; Motherlode; Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 04 at 3:50PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Plumas, southeastern Butte and northern Yuba Counties through 445 PM PST... At 350 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Oroville Dam, or near Oroville, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oroville, Brush Creek Rs, Pulga, Palermo, Thermalito, Hurleton, South Oroville, Oroville Dam, Oroville East, Feather Falls, Concow and Wyandotte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Sacramento Valley; Motherlode; Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park
